name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-meetings-live-code-interview-csharp
title: Live coding interview using Shared meeting stage
shortDescription: This sample application showcases live coding interviews in Microsoft Teams using the Live Share SDK, allowing participants to collaborate in real-time on coding questions.
longDescription: This sample application enables live coding interviews in Microsoft Teams by utilizing the Live Share SDK, where a side panel displays coding questions for participants. Once a question is shared, all participants can collaboratively write and edit code, with real-time updates visible to everyone in the meeting.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing live coding interview using shared meeting stage

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
